Title: The Game
Writer: Joe Gayton (creator), Tony Gayton (creator), Jami O'Brien, Bruce Marshall Romans (executive story editor), Lolis Eric Elie (executive story editor), Tom Brady (staff writer)
Actors: Anson Mount, Colm Meaney, Common, Christopher Heyerdahl
Plot: Cullen and Elam try to secure a new lumber source following a railroad accident; Durant tells Louise a secret about Cullen.
